name: Bolo (itch)
description:
Bolo!

Game made in 3 days by Medow for the Quarantine Jam 2021.

Roll your way to victory in this speed game. Beat all 3 levels with 3 stars to unlock a secret!

Controls:

WASD: to move

Left Click: to dash towards the mouse pointer

Space: quick restart

Escape: back

Credit:

Micah Wosilius - Playtesting

Andrew Dawson - Music and Playtesting https://gummerfly.bandcamp.com/ 

Rainy Hearts by Camellina - Font

All other sprites, sound effects, and code made by me.
